title: Increase in the Demand for Labor

content.question: Suppose the demand for automobiles increases. Which of the following explains what happens in the labor market for automobile workers?

choices.label: The supply of automobile workers increases resulting in lower wages and employment.
The demand for automobile workers decreases resulting in higher wages and employment.
The supply of automobile workers decreases resulting in higher wages and employment.
The demand for automobile workers increases resulting in higher wages and employment.
There is no impact on the labor market, since the change in demand is in the product market.

content.answer: The demand for automobile workers increases resulting in higher wages and employment.

topic.text: 5.2: Changes in Factor Demand and Factor Supply

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine the effect(s) of one or more changes on other economic markets.
